spikeTrap.name: Trap
spikeTrap.description: A floor trap of some sort, that seems to be triggered by stepping on it. If it can't be disarmed, probably best to go around...

rockyMound.name: Rocky mound
rockyMound.description: A large mound of dirt and rock protrudes through the ground. May have valuable minerals in it if it can be mined.

coffin.name: Coffin
coffin.description: A large stone coffin. Could contain some valuables, or just old bones. Or something else...
